content: Pink expresses cautious optimism and calls on all parties to negotiate in good faith. A full, verifiable ceasefire would demonstrate commitment to peace and enable open dialogue through Green's impartial mediation toward an equitable resolution protecting sovereignty, security, and stability for the region.

Pink expresses solidarity and stands ready to assist diplomatic efforts however possible. We fully support Green's mediation and call for constructive participation from all sides to find common ground through cooperation and compromise.

Pink expresses hope that diplomacy and nonviolence will prevail. We reiterate our solidarity and willingness to assist any efforts upholding principles of sovereignty, security, and peaceful resolution of disputes through open dialogue.

Pink expresses hope that negotiations will proceed constructively. A full, verifiable ceasefire remains essential to establishing trust for open dialogue and preventing further conflict or loss of life as discussions continue toward an equitable resolution respecting sovereignty, security, and human rights for all parties.

content: Pink expresses hope that diplomacy and nonviolence will prevail. We reiterate our solidarity and willingness to assist any efforts upholding principles of sovereignty, security, and peaceful resolution of disputes through open dialogue and cooperation.

Pink expresses hope that the parties will finalize arrangements for an immediate ceasefire and engage openly in talks facilitated by Green aiming for an equitable resolution through cooperation and diplomacy. We call on all nations to support these crucial negotiations by exercising restraint and avoiding any actions that could undermine progress toward a peaceful settlement.

Pink expresses full support for Green's impartial mediation efforts and stands ready to assist verification of any ceasefire agreement or confidence-building measures to enable constructive negotiations. We call on all parties to participate openly in talks and work diligently toward an outcome upholding sovereignty, security, stability, and human rights for the region through diplomacy and understanding.
